name: Soul Cats
description:
Soul Cats is a 3D first-person virtual reality game in which the player must enter a dimly lit psychiatric hospital to capture 5 mischievous cat souls which will be hidden in different rooms.

Each cat has its own ability to hide, so the player in each room must search for it by illuminating its surroundings. To help illuminate their surroundings and be able to see the location of the cat's soul, the player will fire a light gun with an incredible firing capacity which will paint the sectors it hits with light until its emission charge is depleted. 

To capture the souls of the cats the player must shoot them, however, the cats will dodge the shots (only 2 times) and will vanish in the air to locate themselves in a new hiding place inside the room, once captured, the soul of the cat will be kept inside the gun.
